summary.span: 组织将应用于其他控件的样式。

span.span: Organizes styles that will be applied to other controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个 控件可以包含任意数量的样式对象，也可以是从类继承的更多专用样式对象 。A control can contain any number of style objects, or more specialized style objects that inherit from the class. 这些属性应具有唯一的名称属性。These should have unique name properties. 然后，可以通过属性来引用同一页上的其他控件 。You can then refer to other controls on the same page by their property. 此类没有直观的表示形式。This class has no visual representation. 页面还可以使用外部样式表，多个页面可以共享相同的外部样式表。A page can also use an external style sheet, and several pages can share the same external style sheet. 有关样式的详细信息，请参阅 [\

span.span: Introduction to the StyleSheet Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性不同， 属性不从其父属性继承。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果在 父控件上将属性设置为蓝绿色，则子控件不会继承青色的背景色。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit the background color of cyan. 必须将子控件的属性显式设置 为青色，或者必须设置 父控件的属性，并将样式表应用于子控件。You must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

exception.span: 已在运行时访问了 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在只读界面中不可用 。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 对于应用此方法的所有类，可以使用方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，集合的 方法 会清除集合中的所有样式; 对于 ，它会清除集合中的所有选择。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面上的样式表继承了在所引用用户控件的根级别定义的样式表中的样式。The style sheet on the page inherits the styles in a style sheet defined at the root level of the referenced user control. 例如，如果用户控件上的样式表具有一个名为的属性 `Style1` ，则该页面可以访问，就 `Style1` 像它在页面上的样式表中一样。For example, if the style sheet on the user control has a property named `Style1`, the page can access `Style1` as if it were in the style sheet on the page.
